Description:

The new season of the popular video game series, dedicated to world championship ring motorcycle races. The game includes all the tracks, teams and athletes of the season 2013. Completely redesigned control system and significantly improve the physical model. MotoGP 13 provide the highest level of realism and authenticity. Significantly expanded set of options allows both experienced players and beginners to choose their own style of driving. For those who prefer to minimize risk, there are special features to facilitate the game.
